page.title: 12Dialect 1
page.content: Craig: A caw ma gym shoes "sannies." Richard:Aye,sannies.A spose oo huv got some ae oor ane words.-Dae instead o' dinny.They wudnae sae I 'n' nu' on the BBC. Craig: What dae you caw yer mum n' dad?A caw ma dad Hamish,but he's no cawd Hamish really. Claire: A caw ma house hoose,an ma sister caws it hoosie. Bruce: Ma da's boss caws me "We Moff" an a caw ma dad "Big Moff." Richard:A caw ma dog "Dug".Here,whit dae ye caw a man athoot a dug? dugless! Craig :Ee ken that thing ee turn ower the tele with.The remote control thing,ee ken.Ma dad caws it"the thing ee dae it wi."A hate thae things cos ma dad never lets ee see half ae the programme.
